solution_line_template: The total number of eggs the family had is {dozens_prepared} * {eggs_per_dozen} = <<{dozens_prepared}*{eggs_per_dozen}={total_eggs}>>{total_eggs} eggs
If each adult received {eggs_per_adult} eggs, the total number of eggs they got is {adults} * {eggs_per_adult} = <<{adults}*{eggs_per_adult}={eggs_for_adults}>>{eggs_for_adults} eggs.
Since each girl received an egg, the boys shared {eggs_for_children} - {girls} = <<{eggs_for_children}-{girls}={eggs_for_boys}>>{eggs_for_boys} eggs
If each boy received 1 egg more than each girl, each received {eggs_per_girl}+{extra_eggs_per_boy} = <<{eggs_per_girl}+{extra_eggs_per_boy}={eggs_per_boy}>>{eggs_per_boy} eggs
The boys received {eggs_for_boys} eggs, and if each got {eggs_per_boy} eggs, then {eggs_for_boys}/{eggs_per_boy} = <<{eggs_for_boys}/{eggs_per_boy}={boys}>>{boys} boys went on the trip
